vcsa_monitor.disk package¶

Submodules¶

vcsa_monitor.disk.disk module¶

vcsa_monitor.disk.disk.get_disk_performance(vcsa, token, perftype, function, log, debug)[source]¶

Get disk latency, read and write rate

Mapping example (kernel map dm-x device to logical volume dynamically)::
dm-0 swap_vg-swap1 dm-1 updatemgr_vg-updatemgr dm-2 imagebuilder_vg-imagebuilder dm-3 core_vg-core dm-4 archive_vg-archive dm-5 dblog_vg-dblog dm-6 autodeploy_vg-autodeploy dm-7 netdump_vg-netdump dm-8 log_vg-log dm-9 seat_vg-seat dm-10 db_vg-db dm-11 lifecycle_vg-lifecycle dm-12 vtsdblog_vg-vtsdblog dm-13 vtsdb_vg-vtsdb
Parameters:
  • vcsa (str) – name of a specific vCenter (fqdn)
  • token (str) – session id
  • perftype (str) – set a specific performance metric
  • function (str) – set a specific metric function
  • log (bool) – enable log to file
  • debug (bool) – enable debug
Returns:

rate performance in msec per io or num of io per msec (sampling: 5 minutes)
Return type:

time, float
